node.excerpt: Ollie and Aunt My aunt, Ollie and I find adventure when we are together. We take hikes, walks and rollerskating!!
My Dogs I have 2 dogs! Ozzy, an English Setter, and Nala, a Weimeriener. They are the best dogs.
Girls Rule! I love superheros and like playing one. I like Supergirl, Wonderwoman, Rey!
Farm work! My Aunt works with horses and sometimes I get to go and help her work. I love being around horses. They are so fun.
